article_title: U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services (and Hinton native) Burwell speaks to NGA
article_text:
Beckley, WV (25801)

Today

Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 82F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Pamela Pritt REGISTER-HERALD REPORTER
